column2: "Na Aaron ne mbabanyin beenu no hɔn wu a wɔtwee bɛɛn EWURADZE enyim
column3: na wowuwui no ekyir no

column2: "na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Kasa kyerɛ wo nua Aaron dɛ
column4: Mma ɔnnhɛn bea krɔnkrɔn no mu nnkɔ ntwamutam no mu
column5: wɔ mbɔbɔrhu egua no a ɔwɔ adaka no do no enyim aber nyinara; amma woeennwuwu: na mununkum no mu na mibeyi moho akyerɛ wɔ mbɔbɔrhu egua no do."

column2: "Iyi na Aaron mfa mbɛhɛn bea krɔnkrɔn no: ɔnantwisaa eburwa a wɔdze bɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr
column3: nye oguannyin a wɔdze bɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr."

column2: "Ɔnhyɛ ndwera sortar krɔnkrɔn no
column3: na ndwera ntwontwo no nkata no ho
column4: na ndwera abɔyamu no mbɔ do
column5: na ɔnhyɛ ndwera asɔfokyɛw no: ntar krɔnkrɔn no nye no; onguar no honam wɔ nsu mu

column2: "Na ɔngye Israelmba mboanofo no hɔ mpɔnkyenyin ebien mfa mbɔ bɔn ho afɔr
column3: na oguannyin kor mfa mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr."

column2: "Na Aaron mfa bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no a ɔyɛ nankasa nedze no
column3: mbra
column4: na ɔmfa mpata mma nankasa noho nye ne fie."

column2: "Na ɔmfa mpɔnkye ebien no mbegyina EWURADZE enyim wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano."
"Na Aaron ntwe mpɔnkye ebien no ho tonto; tonto kor nyɛ EWURADZE dze
column3: na tonto kor so nyɛ Azazel  dze."
column4: "#16.8 AZAZEL: Wotum dze gyina hɔ ma apɔnkyenyin a wɔdze no eyi mbusu na woegyaa no ma ɔnenam haban mu anaadɛ beebi a apɔnkyenyin a woehue mbusu egu no do no rokɔ no."

column2: "Na Aaron mfa apɔnkye a EWURADZE tonto bɔɔ no no mbra
column3: na ɔmfa mbɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Apɔnkye a Azazel tonto bɔɔ no no dze
column3: ɔmfa no enyikan mbegyina EWURADZE enyim
column5: dɛ wokegyaa no ma Azazel ma ɔkɔ sar no do."

column2: "Na Aaron mfa bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no a ɔyɛ nankasa nedze no mbra
column3: ma ɔmfa mpata mma nankasa noho
column5: na onku bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no a ɔyɛ nankasa nedze no:"

column2: "na ɔmfa eduhuamsɛn gyabiriw mfi afɔrmbukyia no do wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: na eduhuam a woesiw no mokomoko ne nsa ma
column4: na ɔmfa mbra ntwamutam no mu:"

column2: "na ɔmfa eduhuam no ngu gya no do wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: ama eduhuam no no wusiw aakata mbɔbɔrhu egua no a ɔwɔ dase no do no ho

column2: "na ɔmfa nantwisaa no ho bɔgyaa bi
column3: na ɔmfa ne nsatseaba nka mpetse mbɔbɔrhu egua no do wɔ boka afamu; na ɔmfa ne nsatseaba nka bɔgya no bi mpetse mbɔbɔrhu egua no enyim mpɛn esuon."

column2: "Nkyii onku bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkye no a ɔyɛ ɔman no dze no
column3: na ɔmfa no bɔgyaa no mbra ntwamutam no mu
column4: na ɔmfa no bɔgyaa no nyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze nantwisaa no no bɔgyaa yɛe no
column5: na ɔmfa mpetse mbɔbɔrhu egua no do

column2: "na ɔmfa mpata mma bea krɔnkrɔn no
column3: wɔ Israelmba hɔn efifidze
column5: mekyerɛ hɔn bɔn nyinara ho; na dɛm na ɔnyɛ mma ehyiadzibuw no a osi hɔn mu no ɔnam hɔn efifidze no ntsi."

column2: "Na mma nyimpa biara nntsena ehyiadzibuw no mu aber a ɔrokɔ mu akɛpata wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn no araa nkodu dɛ obefir edzi
column3: na ɔapata ama nankasa noho

column2: "Na omfir edzi nkɔ afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE enyim no ho
column3: na ɔmpata mma no; na ɔmfa nantwisaa no no bɔgyaa no bi
column4: nye apɔnkye no no bɔgyaa no bi na ɔmfa nkeka afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn ho nhyia."

column2: "Na ɔmfa ne nsatseaba nka bɔgya no bi mpetse do mpɛn esuon
column3: na ɔntsew ho
column4: na ɔnyɛ no krɔnkrɔn mfi Israelmba hɔn efifidze no mu."

column2: "Na sɛ owie mpata ma bea krɔnkrɔn no
column3: nye ehyiadzibuw no

column2: "na Aaron mfa ne nsa ebien nyinara ngu apɔnkye nyikan no etsifi
column3: na ɔnka Israelmba hɔn emumuyɛ nyinara
column7: na ɔmfa no nhyɛ ɔbanyin a woeyi no esi hɔ no nsa ma onkegyaa no ma ɔnkɔ sar no do:"

column2: "na apɔnkye no nsoa hɔn emumuyɛ nyinara mfa nkɔ."
"Na Aaron mbra ehyiadzibuw no mu
column3: na onyi ndwera ntar no a ɔhyɛe kɔr bea krɔnkrɔn no

column2: "na onguar wɔ nsu mu wɔ beebi a ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn
column3: na ɔnhyɛ ne ntar
column5: na ɔnkɔbɔ ne hyew afɔr nye ɔman no hɔn hyew afɔr no

column2: "Na bɔn ho afɔr seradze no ɔnhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do."
"Na nyia okegyaa apɔnkye no ma Azazel no ɔnhor ne ntar
column3: na onguar no honam wɔ nsu mu
column4: na n’ekyir no ɔmbra nseraban no mu."

column2: "Na bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no
column3: nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkye a wɔdze hɔn bɔgyaa baa bɛpataa wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn no
column4: wɔmfa nkɔ nseraban no ekyir; na wɔnhyew hɔn nwoma
column6: nye hɔn egyanan wɔ gya mu."

column2: "Na nyia ɔhyew no no nhor ne ntar
column3: na onguar wɔ nsu mu
column4: na n’ekyir no ɔmbra nseraban no mu."

column2: "Na ɔyɛ daa ahyɛdze ma hom: bosoom a otsia esuon no mu no
column3: bosoom no ne da a otsia du no
column7: ɔhɔho a ɔbɔsoɛ hom mu o

column2: "na da yi mu na wɔmpata mma hom
column3: mfa ntsew homho; ama hom ho aatsew efi hom bɔn nyinara mu wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Ɔyɛ ahomgye mu ahomgye afe ma hom
column3: na hom mbrɛ homho adze; ɔyɛ daa ahyɛdze."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo a wɔasera no ngo a woetu no esi nkyɛn dɛ ondzi sɔfo n’egya n’ananmu no mpata
column3: na ɔnhyɛ ndwera ntar no

column2: "na ɔmpata mma ahotseweebea krɔnkrɔn no
column3: na ɔmpata mma ehyiadzibuw no nye afɔrmbukyia no
column4: na ɔmpata mma ɔsɔfo no nye ɔman baguafo no nyinara."

column2: "Na iyi nyɛ daa ahyɛdze mma hom
column3: mfa mpata mma Israelmba wɔ hɔn bɔn nyinara ntsi prɛko wɔ afrenhyia mu. Na ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."
